Sns.Subject: AWS Budgets: budgets-alarm has exceeded your alert threshold
Sns.Message:
AWS Budget Notification May 28, 2024
AWS Account 012345678912

Dear AWS Customer,

You requested that we alert you when the ACTUAL Cost associated with your budgets-alarm budget is greater than $17.75 per day. Yesterday, the ACTUAL Cost associated with this budget is $36.35. You can find additional details below and by accessing the AWS Budgets dashboard [1].

Budget Name: budgets-alarm
Budget Type: Cost
Budgeted Amount: $88.75
Alert Type: ACTUAL
Alert Threshold: > $17.75
ACTUAL Amount: $36.35

[1] https://console.aws.amazon.com/billing/home#/budgets
